email_chain.subject: Freight Offer for Iron Ore from Port Hedland to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear James,

I hope this message finds you well. I am reaching out with a freight offer for 150,000MT of Iron Ore from Port Hedland to Qingdao on CIF terms.

The vessel we propose is the MV OCEAN HORIZON, with a DWT of 180,000 and LOA of 300m. The laycan is set for 15th to 20th October, and the loading window is 48 hours. The initial freight quote is USD 18.50 per MT.

Please let me know if this works for you or if you need any further details.

Best regards,
Sarah Lee
Maritime Brokers Ltd.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Iron Ore from Port Hedland to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

Thank you for the offer. USD 18.50 seems a bit high given the current market conditions. Could you consider lowering the freight to USD 17.75 per MT?

Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate per day?

Looking forward to your reply.

Best,
James Carter
Global Charterers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Iron Ore from Port Hedland to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear James,

Thank you for your response. Considering our long-term relationship, I can offer a revised freight rate of USD 18.00 per MT. The demurrage rate is set at USD 25,000 per day.

Please note that the laycan remains 15th to 20th October, and the loading window is still 48 hours. I trust this revised offer meets your expectations.

Best regards,
Sarah Lee
Maritime Brokers Ltd.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Iron Ore from Port Hedland to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

Thank you for the revised offer. We can agree to the USD 18.00 per MT, provided the laycan is strictly adhered to. Could you confirm the stem details and any potential delays?

Best,
James Carter
Global Charterers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Iron Ore from Port Hedland to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear James,

I confirm that the laycan will be strictly adhered to, and the stem details are as follows: loading at Port Hedland on 15th October, with a 48-hour loading window. There are no anticipated delays at this stage.

Please let me know if you need any further clarifications.

Best regards,
Sarah Lee
Maritime Brokers Ltd.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Iron Ore from Port Hedland to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

Thank you for the confirmation. We agree to the terms and will proceed with the booking. Please send over the contract for review.

Best,
James Carter
Global Charterers
